reference.shortdesc: The varname element identifies a variable that is supplied to a software application.

section.title: Rendering expectations
section.p: The contents of the varname element is typically rendered in an italic font.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The varname element is specialized from keyword. It is defined in the software domain module.
